messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

LGTM On Mon, Sep 3, 2012 at 10:20 PM, wrote: > Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com, > > Message: > Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, > > I'd like you to review this change to > https://go.googlecode.com/hg > > > Description: > doc: fix typo in Concurrency Patterns article > > Fixes issue 3178. > > Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/6506064/ > > Affected files: > M doc/articles/concurrency_patterns.html > > > Index: doc/articles/concurrency_patterns.html > =================================================================== > --- a/doc/articles/concurrency_patterns.html > +++ b/doc/articles/concurrency_patterns.html > @@ -64,7 +64,7 @@ >

> >

> -This problem is a textbook of example of what is known as a > +This problem is a textbook example of what is known as a > race condition, > but > the fix is trivial. We just make sure to buffer the channel ch > (by > adding the buffer length as the second argument to href="/pkg/builtin/#make">make), > >

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=29990fa0951c ***
